subject: Re: Order #SSN5880 confirmed
description_text:
Hello,

What is the status of my order (number SSN5880)? I paid for express
shipping and I didn't receive any status update that it was even shipped.
Please let me know as soon as possible.

Kind regards,
Oskar Roesler

conversations.body_text:
Hello! It's been 4 days since I ordered pedals with express shipping and
you did not even send it. From my perspective, the additional fee for
express shipping is not applicable anymore and I demand a refund in this
regard.

Hi Oskar Roesler,     We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was shipped on the 10th and is currently in transit. It is expected to arrive around the 19th. Below is your tracking link: https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231334497

Ok, so I demand a refund for the express shopping fee, as it is far from
being express.

Kind regards,
Oskar Roesler

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 07:40, support@simsonn.com

Hello,

Again, I demand refund of shipping fees as you did not deliver the product
on time and I paid extra for it. If you do not do this by Monday, I am
filing a complaint to Visa for a chargeback for this amount.

Kind regards,
Oskar Roesler
